items.title: LLMs Vs. Geolocation: GPT-5 Performs Worse Than Other AI Models
items.summary: In June, Bellingcat ran 500 geolocation tests, comparing LLMs from various companies against each other, as well as Google Lens – a staple tool for finding the location of photos. items.title: The Open Source Tool That Has Preserved 150,000 Pieces of Online Evidence
items.summary: Bellingcat’s Auto Archiver is a tool aimed at preserving online digital content before it can be modified, deleted or taken down.
